医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究揭示了人们对迷幻疗法的复杂态度在基因组出版社对埃默里大学研究人员的全面采访中，今天发表的一项新研究揭示了人们对迷幻疗法的复杂态度，详细的统计数据显示了对潜在益处的强烈支持和对风险的高度认识。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/New-study-reveals-complex-attitudes-toward-psychedelic-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/New-study-reveals-complex-attitudes-toward-psychedelic-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aab51f14-71a4-4754-9973-bd59dd315e27 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 11:20:41 -0500 New study reveals complex attitudes toward psychedelic therapy
研究证明神经干细胞移植治疗慢性脊髓损伤的安全性加州大学圣地亚哥分校医学院研究人员领导的一项一期临床试验证明了神经干细胞移植治疗慢性脊髓损伤的长期安全性和可行性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Study-demonstrates-safety-of-neural-stem-cell-transplant-for-treating-chronic-spinal-cord-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Study-demonstrates-safety-of-neural-stem-cell-transplant-for-treating-chronic-spinal-cord-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aceb7976-63fb-444f-bc8d-26469e43e04f Wed, 18 Dec 2024 11:12:53 -0500 Study demonstrates safety of neural stem cell transplant for treating chronic spinal cord injury
普利茅斯研究人员主导推进 NF2-SWN 脑膜瘤研究普利茅斯大学的研究人员正在领导一项创新计划，以推进 NF2 相关神经鞘瘤病 (NF2-SWN) 脑膜瘤的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Plymouth-researchers-lead-initiative-to-advance-the-study-of-meningiomas-in-NF2-SWN.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Plymouth-researchers-lead-initiative-to-advance-the-study-of-meningiomas-in-NF2-SWN.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35748eef-7aac-492d-8954-ded04a153d1d Wed, 18 Dec 2024 11:07:16 -0500 Plymouth researchers lead initiative to advance the study of meningiomas in NF2-SWN
脑肿瘤利用身体的日常节律来促进生长科学家们探索日常糖皮质激素信号如何影响胶质母细胞瘤的生长并使其昼夜节律与宿主同步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Brain-tumors-exploit-bodys-daily-rhythms-to-fuel-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Brain-tumors-exploit-bodys-daily-rhythms-to-fuel-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=750387fc-9d54-4e3e-9fab-792b5eee5ad2 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 10:16:00 -0500 Brain tumors exploit body's daily rhythms to fuel growth
CBD 可安全用于患有晚期乳腺癌和临床焦虑的女性这项 II 期试验探索了 CBD 对乳腺癌患者焦虑的作用，表明了安全性和潜在的抗焦虑作用，尽管主要结果尚未取得成功。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/CBD-can-be-used-safely-in-women-with-advanced-breast-cancer-and-clinical-anxiety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/CBD-can-be-used-safely-in-women-with-advanced-breast-cancer-and-clinical-anxiety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93e832bf-4613-4ad1-a346-f2a1998e766e Wed, 18 Dec 2024 09:49:00 -0500 CBD can be used safely in women with advanced breast cancer and clinical anxiety
突破性发现为药物靶向粘附 GPCR 开启了大门美国食品和药物管理局批准的近 35% 的药物通过靶向 G 蛋白偶联受体 (GPCR) 发挥作用，GPCR 是嵌入细胞膜中的蛋白质，使细胞能够相互通讯。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Breakthrough-discovery-opens-doors-for-targeting-adhesion-GPCRs-with-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Breakthrough-discovery-opens-doors-for-targeting-adhesion-GPCRs-with-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0f473dc-adcc-4b85-8230-f4ba4fa76b67 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 09:42:29 -0500 Breakthrough discovery opens doors for targeting adhesion GPCRs with drugs
营养保健品：探索不受监管的医疗保健领域的潜在好处和挑战营养保健品具有从缓解偏头痛到支持认知等潜在的健康益处，但必须解决安全和监管问题才能有效使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Nutraceuticals-exploring-pottial-benefits-and-challenges-of-an-unregulated-healthcare-frontier.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Nutraceuticals-exploring-pottial-benefits-and-challenges-of-an-unregulated-healthcare-frontier.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6e420d7-7602-4709-bfbf-13329ed64df9 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 09:02:00 -0500 Nutraceuticals: exploring potential benefits and challenges of an unregulated healthcare frontier
太多的屏幕时间会损害学龄前儿童的睡眠，加剧注意力、情绪和多动问题研究人员研究了屏幕时间如何影响学龄前儿童的行为问题，以及睡眠质量是否介导了这种关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Too-much-screen-time-harms-preschoolers-sleep-fueling-attention-mood-and-hyperactivity-issues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Too-much-screen-time-harms-preschoolers-sleep-fueling-attention-mood-and-hyperactivity-issues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3dc80bc4-010f-4cee-89ef-e6471153c4da Wed, 18 Dec 2024 08:14:00 -0500 Too much screen time harms preschoolers' sleep, fueling attention, mood, and hyperactivity issues
新的诊断测试可早期发现骨关节炎骨关节炎的诊断通常发生在软骨退化严重的晚期，因此很难将其与其他类型的关节炎区分开来并确定最佳的治疗方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/New-diagnostic-test-offers-early-detection-of-osteoarthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/New-diagnostic-test-offers-early-detection-of-osteoarthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a91a69c2-2933-476a-b5b1-38cfb1a2662f Wed, 18 Dec 2024 06:59:36 -0500 New diagnostic test offers early detection of osteoarthritis
bit.bio 融资 3000 万美元，由 M&G Investments 领投全球细胞编程技术领导者 bit.bio 今天宣布成功完成由领先的国际储蓄和投资公司 M&G Investments 领投的 3000 万美元融资。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/bitbio-raises-2430-million-led-by-MG-Investments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/bitbio-raises-2430-million-led-by-MG-Investments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4c25ae1-1511-4c88-8843-83264249a872 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 06:43:00 -0500 bit.bio raises $30 million led by M&G Investments
